description: This is another series of fall where you wouldn't expect anything.  In Dayspring there is a brook just off a residential street that you can follow upstream to a series of falls.  The biggest one is about 15ft high but the total drop is much higher.
directions: Highway 3 south of Bridgewater.  Go to Dayspring and park on Bolivar drive at N44.37561 W64.47845
title: Rhodenizer Brook Falls
